text:
TIRUNELVELI

Sri Uchchini Makalai Amman and Sri Mariamman Temples: 74th festival, Sri Ganpathi homam, 5 a.m., navagraha homam, 6 a.m., Lakshmi puja, 6.30 a.m., special puja to Vinayaka, 7 a.m., makappu, 6 p.m., kappu, temple premises, 7 p.m.

Yousufia Kindergarten and Primary School: 17th annual day and inauguration of ‘Osmania Library’, N. Jehangir, treasurer, Yousufia Yethim Khana, presides, 5 p.m.

Alcoholics Anonymous and Al-Anon: Regular meeting, St. Xavier’s Higher Secondary School, Palayamkottai, 7 p.m.

PAPANASAM

Thiruvalluvar College: Graduation day, Kundrakudi Ponnambala Adigal, secretary, Thiruvalluvar College, presides, K. Baskar, Vice-Chancellor, Manonmaniam Sundaranar University, delivers address, 4.30 p.m.
title: engagements
